name: House of Shadows
description:
SNEAKING through a haunted house... HIDING from spooky ghosts... OUTSMARTING fiendish puzzles... Do you love all things sneaky and spooky? Then welcome to House of Shadows!

Check out the trailer at: http://youtu.be/FY2sDKWmaO4

In House of Shadows, your little sister has wandered into a haunted house. Sneak in after her, avoid the monsters, and lead her back to safety before the ghosts catch you!

House of Shadows offers Hide-and-Sneak gameplay with gorgeous light-based visuals. Torches glow and flicker in real time. Lightning casts shadows across dusty rooms. Your flashlight lights up dark corners. You've never seen graphics quite this lush on your iOS device!

FEATURING:

* Delightful Hide-and-Sneak gameplay
* Great for all players young and old
* Unbelievable lighting effects
* 60 levels, with more arriving soon
* Two distinct monster types: ghosts and zombies
* Choose your own character: girl or boy
* Two haunted houses full of puzzles, treasure, and adventure
